summary: Computes statistical measures of how a signal exceeds a set of thresholds, delivering the cumulative time above each threshold, the count of upward crossings, the mean excess duration, and the root‑mean‑square excess duration.
business_intent: Supports scientific and engineering analysis of time‑series data by quantifying excess behavior relative to user‑defined thresholds, facilitating diagnostics, performance assessment, and research insights.
